message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that.  Could you meet me at $13,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
